title: No More Coca-Cola | Guest: Harry Dent | 2/3/21
description:
In this week’s comrade update, Twitter has banned MyPillow’s account after CEO Mike Lindell tweeted from it. Coca-Cola is now demanding diversity at law firms that work with it, and Glenn in turn bans Coca-Cola products in his house. Glenn goes more into the Coca-Cola controversy and how the company is leading the country into the Great Reset. “The Sound of Silence” is a warning for what we’re now living through. Glenn explains what an “oligarchy” is and how it may play out in America. Economist and author Harry Dent joins to discuss the GameStop controversy and give a dire warning about the fast-approaching future of the economy. Andrew Cuomo has fallen so far that even Democrats are calling him out. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
